mapper.select: select l.patient_id as patientId, l.outpatient_id as outpatientId, l.patient_name as patientName, l.sex,l.age, l.doctor_name as doctorName, l.patient_feature as patientFeature, d_i.depart_name as departName from (select p_i.patient_id, o_i.outpatient_id, p_i.patient_name, p_i.sex, p_i.age, o_i.depart_id, e_i.name as doctor_name, o_i.check_time, p_i.patient_feature from patient_info p_i join outpatient_info o_i on p_i.patient_id = o_i.patient_id join employee_info e_i on o_i.employee_id = e_i.employee_id where p_i.patient_id=#{id} order by o_i.check_time desc limit 1) l join depart_info d_i on l.depart_id = d_i.depart_id;
